messages.content: Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
How many patients live in Amsterdam?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient WHERE location = 'Amsterdam'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Can you please outline to me how many individuals with a medical condition are currently registered in Amsterdam?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient WHERE location = 'Amsterdam'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Can you please tell me how many patients are dead in total?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient WHERE dead = 'ja'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
How many patients are deceased?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient WHERE dead = 'ja'

Show me a list of all patients from abroad.
SELECT patient.* FROM patient LEFT JOIN systemcountry ON systemcountry.id = patient.land_id WHERE systemcountry.NAME != 'Nederland'

I want an overview by function of how many employees are employed.
SELECT employee.function, count(employee.function) as count FROM employee GROUP BY employee.function

Please show me the phone numbers of patients named 'Meis' in care pathway 'Care Pathway 2'.

SELECT patient.phonemobile, patient.phonehome, patient.phonework FROM carepathway INNER JOIN patient on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE carepathway.name = 'Zorgtraject 2' and patient.surname = 'Meis'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please give me the phone numbers of patients named 'Meis', who have a care pathway named 'Care Pathway 2'.

SELECT patient.phonemobile, patient.phonehome, patient.phonework FROM carepathway INNER JOIN patient on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE carepathway.name = 'Zorgtraject 2' and patient.surname = 'Meis'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please give me the email address of all patients who live on Canal Street who are over 60 years old.
SELECT email FROM patient WHERE address_street_name = 'Kanaalweg' and DATEDIFF(year, date_of_birth, current_date) > 60
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Could you provide me with the email addresses of patients who are over sixty years old and have their residential address on Canal Street?
SELECT email FROM patient WHERE address_street_name = 'Kanaalweg' and DATEDIFF(year, date_of_birth, current_date) > 60
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with the clients for whom the email address has not yet been entered
SELECT patient.id, patient.give_name, patient.surname FROM patient LEFT JOIN patient_email on patient_email.patient_id = patient.id WHERE patient_email.email is NULL and patient.email = ''
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Which clients are missing the email address?
SELECT patient.id, patient.given_name, patient.surname FROM patient LEFT JOIN patient_email on patient_email.patient_id = patient.id WHERE patient_email.email is NULL and patient.email = ''

SELECT * FROM patient WHERE bsnvalue != '999999999' and widtype = 'none'

Please provide me with a list of all appointments on May 6, 2020 by noon.
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE intervalstart < '2020-05-06 12:00:00' and intervalstart > '2020-05-06 00:00:00'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code

SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE intervalstart < '2020-05-06 12:00:00' and intervalstart > '2020-05-06 00:00:00'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
How many people have insurance?

SELECT count(*) FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl ON insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' WHERE insurancenl.insured = 'ja'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
How many clients are insured?

SELECT count(*) FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl ON insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' WHERE insurancenl.insured = 'ja'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with a list of the policy numbers of clients where the insurance check was done for 2019.

SELECT insurancenl.policy_number FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl ON insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' WHERE YEAR(patient.covcheckdate) < '2019'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Can I receive a list of the policy numbers of patients where the insurance check was done before the year 2019

SELECT insurancenl.policy_number FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl ON insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' WHERE YEAR(patient.covcheckdate) < '2019'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What is the average age of my patient population and how many patients do I have in total?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(year, date_of_birth, current_date)) as average_age, count(*) as number_of_patients FROM patient
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Can you provide me with the average age of my patient population as well as the total number of patients in my care facility?
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(year, date_of_birth, current_date)) as average_age, count(*) as number_of_patients FROM patient
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with a list of patients and their care pathways in which a care pathway has been cancelled.
SELECT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.naam FROM carepathway LEFT JOIN patient on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE carepathway.status = 'cancelled'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with a list of patients and their respective care pathways in which a care pathway has been cancelled
SELECT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.naam FROM carepathway LEFT JOIN patient on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE carepathway.status = 'cancelled'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please show me all cancellations where the reason was illness
SELECT * FROM appointmentparticipation WHERE absent = 1 and absentreason LIKE '%ziek%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code

SELECT * FROM appointmentparticipation WHERE absent = 1 and absentreason LIKE '%ziek%'

Please show me the total number of the various coverage types, with the most declined at the top.
SELECT coverage_type, count(id) FROM societypackage GROUP BY coverage_type ORDER BY count(id) DESC

SELECT coverage_type, count(id) FROM societypackage GROUP BY coverage_type ORDER BY count(id) DESC

Please show me all types of appointments that last longer than 30 minutes, except evaluations.
SELECT name FROM appointmenttype WHERE standardduration = 30 and LOWER(name) NOT LIKE '%evaluatie%'

Please show me the various types of appointments that have a duration of more than half an hour, excluding evaluations.
SELECT name FROM appointmenttype WHERE standardduration = 30 and LOWER(name) NOT LIKE '%evaluatie%'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with all caregivers and show if they are still employed at their practice

SELECT systemcaregiver.surname, systemcaregiver.initials, systemcaregiver_carefacility.statusinpractice FROM systemcaregiver_carefacility LEFT JOIN systemcaregiver on systemcaregiver_carefacility.systemcaregiver_id = systemcaregiver.id
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with a list of all caregivers and indicate if they are currently still active at their practice.

SELECT systemcaregiver.surname, systemcaregiver.initials, systemcaregiver_carefacility.statusinpractice FROM systemcaregiver_carefacility LEFT JOIN systemcaregiver on systemcaregiver_carefacility.systemcaregiver_id = systemcaregiver.id

SELECT firstnames, surname FROM patient WHERE location = 'Amsterdam' and sex = 'vrouw'

SELECT firstnames, surname FROM patient WHERE location = 'Amsterdam' and sex = 'vrouw'

SELECT clinic_id, year(intervalstart), count(*) FROM appointment GROUP BY clinic_id, year(intervalstart) ORDER BY year(intervalstart)

Provide me with the numbers of appointments per clinic, sorted by year of appointment.
SELECT clinic_id, year(intervalstart), count(*) FROM appointment GROUP BY clinic_id, year(intervalstart) ORDER BY year(intervalstart)

SELECT message FROM textmessage WHERE message LIKE '%bas%'

SELECT email FROM patient_email WHERE email LIKE '%gmail%'

SELECT firstname, surname, abbreviation, deactivate FROM employee WHERE deactivate is not null

Provide me with all health care providers, their practice names, and show if they are still employed at their practice.

SELECT systemcaregiver.surname, systemcaregiver.initials, systemcaregiver_carefacility.statusinpractice, systemcarefacility.name FROM systemcaregiver_carefacility INNER JOIN systemcaregiver on systemcaregiver_carefacility.systemcaregiver_id = systemcaregiver.id INNER JOIN systemcarefacility on systemcaregiver_carefacility.systemcarefacility_id = systemcarefacility.id

SELECT systemcaregiver.surname, systemcaregiver.initials, systemcaregiver_carefacility.statusinpractice, systemcarefacility.name FROM systemcaregiver_carefacility INNER JOIN systemcaregiver on systemcaregiver_carefacility.systemcaregiver_id = systemcaregiver.id INNER JOIN systemcarefacility on systemcaregiver_carefacility.systemcarefacility_id = systemcarefacility.id
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code

SELECT care_provider_type, count(id) FROM clinic WHERE visitation_place = 'Utrecht' GROUP BY care_provider_type

SELECT care_provider_type, count(id) FROM clinic WHERE visitation_place = 'Utrecht' GROUP BY care_provider_type

SELECT function, email FROM employee WHERE firstname = 'Hannah' and surname = 'Hendriks'

SELECT function, email FROM employee WHERE firstname = 'Hannah' and surname = 'Hendriks'

Please provide me with the email address of Tom Winter

SELECT patient.given_name , patient.surname, patient_email.EMAIL FROM patient LEFT JOIN patient_email on patient_email.patient_id = patient.id WHERE patient.given_name = 'Tom' and patient.surname = 'Winter'

Please provide me with the email address of the individual named Tom Winter.

SELECT patient.given_name , patient.surname, patient_email.EMAIL FROM patient LEFT JOIN patient_email on patient_email.patient_id = patient.id WHERE patient.given_name = 'Tom' and patient.surname = 'Winter'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What care pathways does Jelle Belfor currently have?
SELECT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.name FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on carepathway.patient_id = patient.id WHERE carepathway.PATIENT_ID = 4 and carepathway.enddate is null
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What care pathways is Jelle Belfor currently following?
SELECT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.name FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on carepathway.patient_id = patient.id WHERE carepathway.PATIENT_ID = 4 and carepathway.enddate is null
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What is the number of patients with supplemental insurance?

SELECT DISTINCT(count(patient.ID)), insurancenl.coverage_type FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl on insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date WHERE LOWER(insurancenl.coverage_type) LIKE '%aanvullend%' GROUP BY insurancenl.coverage_type
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
How many patients have supplemental insurance?

SELECT DISTINCT(count(patient.ID)), insurancenl.coverage_type FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl on insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date WHERE LOWER(insurancenl.coverage_type) LIKE '%aanvullend%' GROUP BY insurancenl.coverage_type
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please give me an overview of the 5 most common treatments
SELECT name, count(name) FROM treatment GROUP BY name ORDER BY COUNT(name) DESC LIMIT 5
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What are the five most common treatments?
SELECT name, count(name) FROM treatment GROUP BY name ORDER BY COUNT(name) DESC LIMIT 5
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
What appointments has client Niels Jong had?

SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentparticipation ON appointment.id = appointmentparticipation.appointment_id LEFT JOIN participant ON participant.id = appointmentparticipation.participant_id LEFT JOIN patient ON patient.id = participant.patient_id WHERE patient.given_name = 'Niels' and patient.surname = 'Jong'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Can you please inform me of the appointments that client Niels Jong has had?

SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentparticipation ON appointment.id = appointmentparticipation.appointment_id LEFT JOIN participant ON participant.id = appointmentparticipation.participant_id LEFT JOIN patient ON patient.id = participant.patient_id WHERE patient.given_name = 'Niels' and patient.surname = 'Jong'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please give me an overview of the treatments that client 39 has had.
SELECT treatment.* FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway ON carepathway.patient_id = patient.id LEFT JOIN treatment ON treatment.carepathway_id = carepathway.id WHERE patient.ID = 39

Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Please provide me with each patient's initial appointment

SELECT patient.id AS patient_id, appointment.* FROM (SELECT patient.id, min(appointment.intervalstart) AS min_intervalstart FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentparticipation ON appointment.id = appointmentparticipation.appointment_id LEFT JOIN participant ON participant.id = appointmentparticipation.participant_id LEFT JOIN patient ON patient.id = participant.patient_id GROUP BY patient.id) AS earliest_appointments INNER JOIN patient on patient.id = earliest_appointments.id INNER JOIN appointment on appointment.intervalstart = earliest_appointments.min_intervalstart
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Show me each individual patient's initial appointment.

SELECT patient.id AS patient_id, appointment.* FROM (SELECT patient.id, min(appointment.intervalstart) AS min_intervalstart FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentparticipation ON appointment.id = appointmentparticipation.appointment_id LEFT JOIN participant ON participant.id = appointmentparticipation.participant_id LEFT JOIN patient ON patient.id = participant.patient_id GROUP BY patient.id) AS earliest_appointments INNER JOIN patient on patient.id = earliest_appointments.id INNER JOIN appointment on appointment.intervalstart = earliest_appointments.min_intervalstart
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
I would like a summary of how many patients there are by age group '<25', '25-49', '50-74', and '>74'

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN age < 25 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS under_25, SUM(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 25 AND 49 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS between_25_and_49, SUM(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 50 AND 74 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS between_50_and_74, SUM(CASE WHEN age > 74 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS over_74 FROM (SELECT id, DATEDIFF(year, date_of_birth, current_date) AS age FROM patient) AS age_table INNER JOIN patient on patient.id = age_table.id
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Provide me with a listing of the number of patients grouped by age categories '<25', '25-49', '50-74', and '>74'

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN age < 25 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS under_25, SUM(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 25 AND 49 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS between_25_and_49, SUM(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 50 AND 74 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS between_50_and_74, SUM(CASE WHEN age > 74 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS over_74 FROM (SELECT id, DATEDIFF(year, date_of_birth, current_date) AS age FROM patient) AS age_table INNER JOIN patient on patient.id = age_table.id

How many patients were registered per month over the past year?
SELECT MONTH(entry_date) MONTH, COUNT(*) FROM patient WHERE YEAR(entry_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY MONTH(entry_date) ORDER BY MONTH

I would like a detailed representation of the number of patients registered monthly during the past year.
SELECT MONTH(entry_date) MONTH, COUNT(*) FROM patient WHERE YEAR(entry_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY MONTH(entry_date) ORDER BY MONTH

Please provide me with all of Liesbeth Bruijn's appointments during 2018.

Please provide me with a listing of all of Liesbeth Bruijn's appointments during the year 2018.

SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentparticipation on appointmentparticipation.appointment_id = appointment.id LEFT JOIN participant on participant.id = appointmentparticipation.participant_id LEFT JOIN employee on employee.id = participant.employee_id WHERE employee.firstname = 'Liesbeth' and employee.surname = 'Bruijn' and YEAR(appointment.intervalstart) = '2018'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Which umbrella organization do the insured clients belong to?

SELECT patient.given_name, patient.surname, umbrella_organization.name FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl ON insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' LEFT JOIN systemsocietynl on systemsocietynl.id = insurancenl.society_id LEFT JOIN umbrella_organization_society on umbrella_organization_society.society_id = systemsocietynl.id LEFT JOIN umbrella_organization on umbrella_organization.id = umbrella_organization_society.umbrella_organization_id WHERE insurancenl.insured = 'ja'
Bokito is een chatbot die natuurlijke taal omzet naar SQL code
Which umbrella organization serves the insured clients?

SELECT patient.given_name, patient.surname, umbrella_organization.name FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl ON insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' LEFT JOIN systemsocietynl on systemsocietynl.id = insurancenl.society_id LEFT JOIN umbrella_organization_society on umbrella_organization_society.society_id = systemsocietynl.id LEFT JOIN umbrella_organization on umbrella_organization.id = umbrella_organization_society.umbrella_organization_id WHERE insurancenl.insured = 'ja'

Show me per client the number of active forms that have not been removed, and the number of unique practitioners who have created these forms.
